title: NA support ticket times
body: Ok so I have been waiting for a reply to my ticket for 4 days now, granted the first day i replied with added info and then read the fact that it would reset my position, but 3 days since my second message and still nothing from riot. I am very frustrated and would like help, can anyone give me any info on how fast they have had their tickets replied to recently so I can have at least an idea of when to expect a reply.

replies.body:
We're pretty overloaded with support tickets at the moment. Wait times may be a bit longer than normal, but I promise that we're getting back as soon as we can.

Let me know if you have any questions.
whats an average wait time with you guys being backed up?
Can i get banned for using the imaqtpie announcer pack?
Could you please look into my ticket personally?{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
